testcase.classname: Injection Attack Prevention › SQL Injection Prevention
testcase.name: should block SQL injection in login username

testcase.classname: Injection Attack Prevention › SQL Injection Prevention
testcase.name: should block SQL injection in registration fields

testcase.classname: Injection Attack Prevention › XSS Prevention
testcase.name: should sanitize XSS payloads in input fields

testcase.classname: Injection Attack Prevention › XSS Prevention
testcase.name: should block XSS in URL parameters

testcase.classname: Injection Attack Prevention › NoSQL Injection Prevention
testcase.name: should block NoSQL injection in request body

testcase.classname: Injection Attack Prevention › NoSQL Injection Prevention
testcase.name: should block NoSQL injection in query parameters

testcase.classname: Injection Attack Prevention › Command Injection Prevention
testcase.name: should block command injection in input fields

testcase.classname: Injection Attack Prevention › Path Traversal Prevention
testcase.name: should block path traversal in file operations

testcase.classname: Injection Attack Prevention › WAF Blocking
testcase.name: should return WAF_BLOCKED code for blocked requests

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Invalid JSON Handling
testcase.name: should reject malformed JSON

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Invalid JSON Handling
testcase.name: should reject incomplete JSON

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Invalid JSON Handling
testcase.name: should reject JSON with invalid encoding

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Type Confusion Attacks
testcase.name: should handle type coercion attempts

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Type Confusion Attacks
testcase.name: should handle null/undefined injection

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Type Confusion Attacks
testcase.name: should handle array instead of string

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Type Confusion Attacks
testcase.name: should handle object instead of string

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Prototype Pollution Prevention
testcase.name: should prevent prototype pollution in request body

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Prototype Pollution Prevention
testcase.name: should prevent constructor pollution

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Oversized Payloads
testcase.name: should reject payloads with excessive nesting

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Content-Type Validation
testcase.name: should reject requests with wrong Content-Type

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Special Character Handling
testcase.name: should handle unicode injection attempts

testcase.classname: Malformed Payload Handling › Special Character Handling
testcase.name: should handle emoji and special unicode

testcase.classname: Error Leakage Prevention › Database Error Handling
testcase.name: should not expose database errors to clients

testcase.classname: Error Leakage Prevention › Database Error Handling
testcase.name: should not expose stack traces in production

testcase.classname: Error Leakage Prevention › System Information Leakage
testcase.name: should not expose server version information

testcase.classname: Error Leakage Prevention › System Information Leakage
testcase.name: should not expose file paths in error messages

testcase.classname: Error Leakage Prevention › Authentication Error Messages
testcase.name: should not reveal whether username exists

testcase.classname: Error Leakage Prevention › Authentication Error Messages
testcase.name: should not reveal password validation details

testcase.classname: Error Leakage Prevention › Rate Limit Error Messages
testcase.name: should not expose rate limit implementation details

testcase.classname: Rate Limiting › General API Rate Limiting
testcase.name: should rate limit excessive API requests

testcase.classname: Rate Limiting › Login Endpoint Rate Limiting
testcase.name: should enforce rate limits on login endpoint

testcase.classname: Rate Limiting › Registration Endpoint Rate Limiting
testcase.name: should enforce rate limits on registration endpoint

testcase.classname: Rate Limiting › WAF Rate Limiting
testcase.name: should rate limit requests that trigger WAF rules

testcase.classname: Rate Limiting › Rate Limit Reset
testcase.name: should reset rate limit after window expires

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Token Validation
testcase.name: should reject requests without authentication token

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Token Validation
testcase.name: should reject requests with invalid token format

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Token Validation
testcase.name: should reject requests with malformed token

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Token Validation
testcase.name: should reject expired tokens

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Token Validation
testcase.name: should reject tampered tokens

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
testcase.name: should enforce customer-only endpoints

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Session Management
testcase.name: should reject requests with invalid session

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Session Management
testcase.name: should reject requests with expired session

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Authentication Bypass Prevention
testcase.name: should not allow authentication bypass via empty token

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Authentication Bypass Prevention
testcase.name: should not allow authentication bypass via SQL injection in token

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Authentication Bypass Prevention
testcase.name: should not expose user information in error messages

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Token Refresh Security
testcase.name: should require valid refresh token

testcase.classname: Authentication Security › Token Refresh Security
testcase.name: should reject expired refresh tokens

testcase.classname: CORS Security › CORS Preflight Requests
testcase.name: should handle OPTIONS preflight requests

testcase.classname: CORS Security › CORS Preflight Requests
testcase.name: should include CORS headers in preflight response

testcase.classname: CORS Security › CORS Origin Whitelisting
testcase.name: should allow requests from whitelisted origins

testcase.classname: CORS Security › CORS Origin Whitelisting
testcase.name: should reject requests from non-whitelisted origins

testcase.classname: CORS Security › CORS Header Exposure
testcase.name: should not expose sensitive headers

testcase.classname: CORS Security › CORS Header Exposure
testcase.name: should only expose necessary headers

testcase.classname: CORS Security › CORS Credentials
testcase.name: should handle credentials in CORS requests

testcase.classname: CORS Security › CORS Method Restrictions
testcase.name: should only allow specified HTTP methods

testcase.classname: Brute Force Protection › Login Rate Limiting
testcase.name: should allow normal login attempts

testcase.classname: Brute Force Protection › Login Rate Limiting
testcase.name: should return rate limit headers

testcase.classname: Brute Force Protection › Account Lockout
testcase.name: should lock account after multiple failed login attempts
